data.headline: Hey, my name is Ryan!
sentences: I am a Houston based software engineer, specializing in full stack web development.
Currently, I work at Paramount Global as an Associate Software Engineer, building new frontend web experiences for Paramount+.
Additionally, I am pursuing my Master's in Computer Science part time at The University of Texas at Austin.
Outside of tech, I enjoy collecting records, watching anime and k-drama, eating good food, and traveling.
